Uses of Class
android.annotation.Widget

Packages that use Widget
android.widget The widget package contains (mostly visual) UI elements to use on your Application screen. 
 

Uses of Widget in android.widget
 

Classes in android.widget with annotations of type Widget
 class DatePicker
          A view for selecting a month / year / day based on a calendar like layout.
 class Gallery
          A view that shows items in a center-locked, horizontally scrolling list.
 class Spinner
          A view that displays one child at a time and lets the user pick among them.
 class TimePicker
          A view for selecting the time of day, in either 24 hour or AM/PM mode.
 class TwoLineListItem
          A view group with two children, intended for use in ListViews.
 class ZoomControls
          The ZoomControls class displays a simple set of controls used for zooming and provides callbacks to register for events.
